meta_title: Agnes Millie | Full Stack Software Architect
meta_description: Portfolio of Agnes Millie, Full Stack Software Architect and Cybersecurity Specialist.
hero_words: Full Stack Software Architect.,Cybersecurity Engineer.,Cloud & DevOps Specialist.,Scalable Solutions.
hero_description: Building the future of technology with robust, secure, and innovative code.
about_p1: As a Software Architect, my passion is transforming complex concepts into functional and scalable solutions. My experience spans the entire development lifecycleâ€”from conception and architecture to implementation and optimization.
about_p2: My specialty is designing and implementing resilient software architectures, focusing on distributed systems and microservice orchestration. I have experience in optimizing performance bottlenecks in high-concurrency applications.
about_p3: I am an active open-source contributor, focusing on observability tools and infrastructure security (DevSecOps).
philosophy_card1_desc: Security is not a feature, but the foundation. I integrate DevSecOps and Zero Trust architecture practices from the very first commit.
philosophy_card2_desc: I build software that reflects business complexity, creating cohesive microservices with clear boundaries.
philosophy_card3_desc: Obsessed with performance. I design event-driven, asynchronous systems that handle high concurrency.
philosophy_card4_desc: A system without observability is a black box. I implement structured logs, metrics, and distributed tracing.
service_card1_desc: Design of scalable distributed systems, high availability, and resilient microservices.
service_card2_desc: Security audits, PenTest, Server Hardening, and compliance with market standards.
service_card3_desc: Automated CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), and Kubernetes orchestration.
service_card4_desc: Implementation of intelligent agents, LLMs, and process automation via Machine Learning.
footer_text: © 2025 Agnes Millie. Developed with precision and code.
